channel.title: Character save
channel.description:
Hi,
I'm having a problem with my cheezscape update 80 source.
For some reason, it won't save when I log off. Every 5 minutes the server autosaves everything successfully, although when I log out, it outputs could not save <player name> and restarts the character from the last time it autosaved.
Is there anyway to fix this?
P.s. Using windows 7 64 bit.
I've posted this thread so many times, with no answer to this one problem. Please Help!

item.title: Character save
item.dc:creator: @vinayak vinayak
item.description:
@vinayak wrote:

Hi,

I’m having a problem with my cheezscape update 80 source.

For some reason, it won’t save when I log off. Every 5 minutes the server autosaves everything successfully, although when I log out, it outputs could not save
and restarts the character from the last time it autosaved.

Is there anyway to fix this?

P.s. Using windows 7 64 bit.

I’ve posted this thread so many times, with no answer to this one problem.
Please Help!
